vv35:4.2: Yodhika bandhukanojakā → yothikā bhaṇḍikā nojakā (sya1ed); yothikābhaṇḍikānojakā (sya2ed)
vv35:5.1: Saḷalalabujabhujaka → … sujaka (si, sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṁyuttā → saññatā (bj)
vv35:7.4: avacāsiḷārapamhe”ti → avacāsulārapakhumeti (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); avacāsi āḷārapamukheti (sya1ed, sya2ed)
vv35:11.4: abbhukiriṁ → abbhokiriṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
